title: Top-selling DVDs in the U.S. in 2019
yAxis: Number of units sold in thousands
summary: This bar chart has 15 categories for the x axis representing Movies, and a y axis representing Number of units sold in thousands.
The highest category is found at The_Goonies where Number of units sold in thousands is 903.47.
The lowest category is found at Aladdin where Number of units sold in thousands is 506.52.

data.Movies: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald

gold: In 2019 , the top-selling DVD in the United States was 1985 movie 'The Goonies ' _ , which sold approximately 903.5 thousand copies in the U.S. that year . In second place was 'Aquaman ' with 868.93 thousand copies sold . The movie also ranked fourth in the 2019 DVD sales list based on consumer spending .
